00078 struct GPUMaterial {
00079     Scene *scene;
00080     Material *ma;
00081 
00082     /* for creating the material */
00083     ListBase nodes;
00084     GPUNodeLink *outlink;
00085 
00086     /* for binding the material */
00087     GPUPass *pass;
00088     GPUVertexAttribs attribs;
00089     int bound;
00090     int builtins;
00091     int alpha, obcolalpha;
00092     int dynproperty;
00093 
00094     /* for passing uniforms */
00095     int viewmatloc, invviewmatloc;
00096     int obmatloc, invobmatloc;
00097     int obcolloc, obautobumpscaleloc;
00098 
00099     ListBase lamps;
00100 };

00141 static GPUMaterial *GPU_material_construct_begin(Material *ma)
00142 {
00143     GPUMaterial *material = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUMaterial), "GPUMaterial");
00144 
00145     material->ma= ma;
00146 
00147     return material;
00148 }
00149 
00150 static void gpu_material_set_attrib_id(GPUMaterial *material)
00151 {
00152     GPUVertexAttribs *attribs;
00153     GPUShader *shader;
00154     GPUPass *pass;
00155     char name[32];
00156     int a, b;
00157 
00158     attribs= &material->attribs;
00159     pass= material->pass;
00160     if (!pass) {
00161         attribs->totlayer = 0;
00162         return;
00163     }
00164     
00165     shader= GPU_pass_shader(pass);
00166     if (!shader) {
00167         attribs->totlayer = 0;
00168         return;
00169     }
00170 
00171     /* convert from attribute number to the actual id assigned by opengl,
00172      * in case the attrib does not get a valid index back, it was probably
00173      * removed by the glsl compiler by dead code elimination */
00174 
00175     for (a=0, b=0; a<attribs->totlayer; a++) {
00176         BLI_snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "att%d", attribs->layer[a].attribid);
00177         attribs->layer[a].glindex = GPU_shader_get_attribute(shader, name);
00178 
00179         if (attribs->layer[a].glindex >= 0) {
00180             attribs->layer[b] = attribs->layer[a];
00181             b++;
00182         }
00183     }
00184 
00185     attribs->totlayer = b;
00186 }
00187 
00188 static int GPU_material_construct_end(GPUMaterial *material)
00189 {
00190     if (material->outlink) {
00191         GPUNodeLink *outlink;
00192         GPUShader *shader;
00193 
00194         outlink = material->outlink;
00195         material->pass = GPU_generate_pass(&material->nodes, outlink,
00196             &material->attribs, &material->builtins, material->ma->id.name);
00197 
00198         if (!material->pass)
00199             return 0;
00200 
00201         gpu_material_set_attrib_id(material);
00202         
00203         shader = GPU_pass_shader(material->pass);
00204 
00205         if (material->builtins & GPU_VIEW_MATRIX)
00206             material->viewmatloc = GPU_shader_get_uniform(shader, GPU_builtin_name(GPU_VIEW_MATRIX));
00207         if (material->builtins & GPU_INVERSE_VIEW_MATRIX)
00208             material->invviewmatloc = GPU_shader_get_uniform(shader, GPU_builtin_name(GPU_INVERSE_VIEW_MATRIX));
00209         if (material->builtins & GPU_OBJECT_MATRIX)
00210             material->obmatloc = GPU_shader_get_uniform(shader, GPU_builtin_name(GPU_OBJECT_MATRIX));
00211         if (material->builtins & GPU_INVERSE_OBJECT_MATRIX)
00212             material->invobmatloc = GPU_shader_get_uniform(shader, GPU_builtin_name(GPU_INVERSE_OBJECT_MATRIX));
00213         if (material->builtins & GPU_OBCOLOR)
00214             material->obcolloc = GPU_shader_get_uniform(shader, GPU_builtin_name(GPU_OBCOLOR));
00215         if (material->builtins & GPU_AUTO_BUMPSCALE)
00216             material->obautobumpscaleloc = GPU_shader_get_uniform(shader, GPU_builtin_name(GPU_AUTO_BUMPSCALE));
00217         return 1;
00218     }
00219 
00220     return 0;
00221 }
00222 
00223 void GPU_material_free(Material *ma)
00224 {
00225     LinkData *link;
00226     LinkData *nlink, *mlink, *next;
00227 
00228     for (link=ma->gpumaterial.first; link; link=link->next) {
00229         GPUMaterial *material = link->data;
00230 
00231         if (material->pass)
00232             GPU_pass_free(material->pass);
00233 
00234         for (nlink=material->lamps.first; nlink; nlink=nlink->next) {
00235             GPULamp *lamp = nlink->data;
00236 
00237             for (mlink=lamp->materials.first; mlink; mlink=next) {
00238                 next = mlink->next;
00239                 if (mlink->data == ma)
00240                     BLI_freelinkN(&lamp->materials, mlink);
00241             }
00242         }
00243 
00244         BLI_freelistN(&material->lamps);
00245 
00246         MEM_freeN(material);
00247     }
00248 
00249     BLI_freelistN(&ma->gpumaterial);
00250 }
00251 
00252 void GPU_material_bind(GPUMaterial *material, int oblay, int viewlay, double time, int mipmap)
00253 {
00254     if (material->pass) {
00255         LinkData *nlink;
00256         GPULamp *lamp;
00257 
00258         /* handle layer lamps */
00259         for (nlink=material->lamps.first; nlink; nlink=nlink->next) {
00260             lamp= nlink->data;
00261 
00262             if (!lamp->hide && (lamp->lay & viewlay) && (!(lamp->mode & LA_LAYER) || (lamp->lay & oblay))) {
00263                 lamp->dynenergy = lamp->energy;
00264                 copy_v3_v3(lamp->dyncol, lamp->col);
00265             }
00266             else {
00267                 lamp->dynenergy = 0.0f;
00268                 lamp->dyncol[0]= lamp->dyncol[1]= lamp->dyncol[2] = 0.0f;
00269             }
00270         }
00271 
00272         GPU_pass_bind(material->pass, time, mipmap);
00273         material->bound = 1;
00274     }
00275 }
00276 
00277 void GPU_material_bind_uniforms(GPUMaterial *material, float obmat[][4], float viewmat[][4], float viewinv[][4], float obcol[4], float autobumpscale)
00278 {
00279     if (material->pass) {
00280         GPUShader *shader = GPU_pass_shader(material->pass);
00281         LinkData *nlink;
00282         GPULamp *lamp;
00283         float invmat[4][4], col[4];
00284 
00285         /* handle builtins */
00286         if (material->builtins & GPU_VIEW_MATRIX) {
00287             GPU_shader_uniform_vector(shader, material->viewmatloc, 16, 1, (float*)viewmat);
00288         }
00289         if (material->builtins & GPU_INVERSE_VIEW_MATRIX) {
00290             GPU_shader_uniform_vector(shader, material->invviewmatloc, 16, 1, (float*)viewinv);
00291         }
00292         if (material->builtins & GPU_OBJECT_MATRIX) {
00293             GPU_shader_uniform_vector(shader, material->obmatloc, 16, 1, (float*)obmat);
00294         }
00295         if (material->builtins & GPU_INVERSE_OBJECT_MATRIX) {
00296             invert_m4_m4(invmat, obmat);
00297             GPU_shader_uniform_vector(shader, material->invobmatloc, 16, 1, (float*)invmat);
00298         }
00299         if (material->builtins & GPU_OBCOLOR) {
00300             copy_v4_v4(col, obcol);
00301             CLAMP(col[3], 0.0f, 1.0f);
00302             GPU_shader_uniform_vector(shader, material->obcolloc, 4, 1, col);
00303         }
00304         if (material->builtins & GPU_AUTO_BUMPSCALE) {
00305             GPU_shader_uniform_vector(shader, material->obautobumpscaleloc, 1, 1, &autobumpscale);
00306         }
00307         /* update lamps */
00308         for (nlink=material->lamps.first; nlink; nlink=nlink->next) {
00309             lamp= nlink->data;
00310 
00311             if (material->dynproperty & DYN_LAMP_VEC) {
00312                 copy_v3_v3(lamp->dynvec, lamp->vec);
00313                 normalize_v3(lamp->dynvec);
00314                 negate_v3(lamp->dynvec);
00315                 mul_mat3_m4_v3(viewmat, lamp->dynvec);
00316             }
00317 
00318             if (material->dynproperty & DYN_LAMP_CO) {
00319                 copy_v3_v3(lamp->dynco, lamp->co);
00320                 mul_m4_v3(viewmat, lamp->dynco);
00321             }
00322 
00323             if (material->dynproperty & DYN_LAMP_IMAT)
00324                 mult_m4_m4m4(lamp->dynimat, lamp->imat, viewinv);
00325             if (material->dynproperty & DYN_LAMP_PERSMAT)
00326                 mult_m4_m4m4(lamp->dynpersmat, lamp->persmat, viewinv);
00327         }
00328 
00329         GPU_pass_update_uniforms(material->pass);
00330     }
00331 }

00333 void GPU_material_unbind(GPUMaterial *material)
00334 {
00335     if (material->pass) {
00336         material->bound = 0;
00337         GPU_pass_unbind(material->pass);
00338     }
00339 }

00362 GPUBlendMode GPU_material_alpha_blend(GPUMaterial *material, float obcol[4])
00363 {
00364     if (material->alpha || (material->obcolalpha && obcol[3] < 1.0f))
00365         return GPU_BLEND_ALPHA;
00366     else
00367         return GPU_BLEND_SOLID;
00368 }

00377 static int gpu_do_color_management(GPUMaterial *mat)
00378 {
00379     return ((mat->scene->r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT) &&
00380        !((mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_COLOR_MANAGEMENT)));

00383 static GPUNodeLink *lamp_get_visibility(GPUMaterial *mat, GPULamp *lamp, GPUNodeLink **lv, GPUNodeLink **dist)
00384 {
00385     GPUNodeLink *visifac, *inpr;
00386 
00387     /* from get_lamp_visibility */
00388     if (lamp->type==LA_SUN || lamp->type==LA_HEMI) {
00389         mat->dynproperty |= DYN_LAMP_VEC;
00390         GPU_link(mat, "lamp_visibility_sun_hemi", GPU_dynamic_uniform(lamp->dynvec, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNVEC, lamp->ob), lv, dist, &visifac);
00391         return visifac;
00392     }
00393     else {
00394         mat->dynproperty |= DYN_LAMP_CO;
00395         GPU_link(mat, "lamp_visibility_other", GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_POSITION), GPU_dynamic_uniform(lamp->dynco, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNCO, lamp->ob), lv, dist, &visifac);
00396 
00397         if (lamp->type==LA_AREA)
00398             return visifac;
00399 
00400         switch(lamp->falloff_type)
00401         {
00402             case LA_FALLOFF_CONSTANT:
00403                 break;
00404             case LA_FALLOFF_INVLINEAR:
00405                 GPU_link(mat, "lamp_falloff_invlinear", GPU_uniform(&lamp->dist), *dist, &visifac);
00406                 break;
00407             case LA_FALLOFF_INVSQUARE:
00408                 GPU_link(mat, "lamp_falloff_invsquare", GPU_uniform(&lamp->dist), *dist, &visifac);
00409                 break;
00410             case LA_FALLOFF_SLIDERS:
00411                 GPU_link(mat, "lamp_falloff_sliders", GPU_uniform(&lamp->dist), GPU_uniform(&lamp->att1), GPU_uniform(&lamp->att2), *dist, &visifac);
00412                 break;
00413             case LA_FALLOFF_CURVE:
00414                 {
00415                     float *array;
00416                     int size;
00417 
00418                     curvemapping_table_RGBA(lamp->curfalloff, &array, &size);
00419                     GPU_link(mat, "lamp_falloff_curve", GPU_uniform(&lamp->dist), GPU_texture(size, array), *dist, &visifac);
00420                 }
00421                 break;
00422         }
00423 
00424         if (lamp->mode & LA_SPHERE)
00425             GPU_link(mat, "lamp_visibility_sphere", GPU_uniform(&lamp->dist), *dist, visifac, &visifac);
00426 
00427         if (lamp->type == LA_SPOT) {
00428             if (lamp->mode & LA_SQUARE) {
00429                 mat->dynproperty |= DYN_LAMP_VEC|DYN_LAMP_IMAT;
00430                 GPU_link(mat, "lamp_visibility_spot_square", GPU_dynamic_uniform(lamp->dynvec, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNVEC, lamp->ob), GPU_dynamic_uniform((float*)lamp->dynimat, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNIMAT, lamp->ob), *lv, &inpr);
00431             }
00432             else {
00433                 mat->dynproperty |= DYN_LAMP_VEC;
00434                 GPU_link(mat, "lamp_visibility_spot_circle", GPU_dynamic_uniform(lamp->dynvec, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNVEC, lamp->ob), *lv, &inpr);
00435             }
00436             
00437             GPU_link(mat, "lamp_visibility_spot", GPU_uniform(&lamp->spotsi), GPU_uniform(&lamp->spotbl), inpr, visifac, &visifac);
00438         }
00439 
00440         GPU_link(mat, "lamp_visibility_clamp", visifac, &visifac);
00441 
00442         return visifac;
00443     }
00444 }

00446 #if 0
00447 static void area_lamp_vectors(LampRen *lar)
00448 {
00449     float xsize= 0.5*lar->area_size, ysize= 0.5*lar->area_sizey, multifac;
00450 
00451     /* make it smaller, so area light can be multisampled */
00452     multifac= 1.0f/sqrt((float)lar->ray_totsamp);
00453     xsize *= multifac;
00454     ysize *= multifac;
00455 
00456     /* corner vectors */
00457     lar->area[0][0]= lar->co[0] - xsize*lar->mat[0][0] - ysize*lar->mat[1][0];
00458     lar->area[0][1]= lar->co[1] - xsize*lar->mat[0][1] - ysize*lar->mat[1][1];
00459     lar->area[0][2]= lar->co[2] - xsize*lar->mat[0][2] - ysize*lar->mat[1][2];
00460 
00461     /* corner vectors */
00462     lar->area[1][0]= lar->co[0] - xsize*lar->mat[0][0] + ysize*lar->mat[1][0];
00463     lar->area[1][1]= lar->co[1] - xsize*lar->mat[0][1] + ysize*lar->mat[1][1];
00464     lar->area[1][2]= lar->co[2] - xsize*lar->mat[0][2] + ysize*lar->mat[1][2];
00465 
00466     /* corner vectors */
00467     lar->area[2][0]= lar->co[0] + xsize*lar->mat[0][0] + ysize*lar->mat[1][0];
00468     lar->area[2][1]= lar->co[1] + xsize*lar->mat[0][1] + ysize*lar->mat[1][1];
00469     lar->area[2][2]= lar->co[2] + xsize*lar->mat[0][2] + ysize*lar->mat[1][2];
00470 
00471     /* corner vectors */
00472     lar->area[3][0]= lar->co[0] + xsize*lar->mat[0][0] - ysize*lar->mat[1][0];
00473     lar->area[3][1]= lar->co[1] + xsize*lar->mat[0][1] - ysize*lar->mat[1][1];
00474     lar->area[3][2]= lar->co[2] + xsize*lar->mat[0][2] - ysize*lar->mat[1][2];
00475     /* only for correction button size, matrix size works on energy */
00476     lar->areasize= lar->dist*lar->dist/(4.0*xsize*ysize);
00477 }

00480 static void ramp_blend(GPUMaterial *mat, GPUNodeLink *fac, GPUNodeLink *col1, GPUNodeLink *col2, int type, GPUNodeLink **outcol)
00481 {
00482     static const char *names[] = {"mix_blend", "mix_add", "mix_mult", "mix_sub",
00483         "mix_screen", "mix_div", "mix_diff", "mix_dark", "mix_light",
00484         "mix_overlay", "mix_dodge", "mix_burn", "mix_hue", "mix_sat",
00485         "mix_val", "mix_color", "mix_soft", "mix_linear"};
00486 
00487     GPU_link(mat, names[type], fac, col1, col2, outcol);
00488 }
00489 
00490 static void do_colorband_blend(GPUMaterial *mat, ColorBand *coba, GPUNodeLink *fac, float rampfac, int type, GPUNodeLink *incol, GPUNodeLink **outcol)
00491 {
00492     GPUNodeLink *tmp, *alpha, *col;
00493     float *array;
00494     int size;
00495 
00496     /* do colorband */
00497     colorband_table_RGBA(coba, &array, &size);
00498     GPU_link(mat, "valtorgb", fac, GPU_texture(size, array), &col, &tmp);
00499 
00500     /* use alpha in fac */
00501     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_alpha_from_col", col, &alpha);
00502     GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", alpha, GPU_uniform(&rampfac), &fac);
00503 
00504     /* blending method */
00505     ramp_blend(mat, fac, incol, col, type, outcol);
00506 }
00507 
00508 static void ramp_diffuse_result(GPUShadeInput *shi, GPUNodeLink **diff)
00509 {
00510     Material *ma= shi->mat;
00511     GPUMaterial *mat= shi->gpumat;
00512     GPUNodeLink *fac;
00513 
00514     if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_RAMPS)) {
00515         if (ma->ramp_col) {
00516             if (ma->rampin_col==MA_RAMP_IN_RESULT) {
00517                 GPU_link(mat, "ramp_rgbtobw", *diff, &fac);
00518                 
00519                 /* colorband + blend */
00520                 do_colorband_blend(mat, ma->ramp_col, fac, ma->rampfac_col, ma->rampblend_col, *diff, diff);
00521             }
00522         }
00523     }
00524 }
00525 
00526 static void add_to_diffuse(GPUMaterial *mat, Material *ma, GPUShadeInput *shi, GPUNodeLink *is, GPUNodeLink *rgb, GPUNodeLink **diff)
00527 {
00528     GPUNodeLink *fac, *tmp, *addcol;
00529     
00530     if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_RAMPS) &&
00531        ma->ramp_col && (ma->mode & MA_RAMP_COL)) {
00532         /* MA_RAMP_IN_RESULT is exceptional */
00533         if (ma->rampin_col==MA_RAMP_IN_RESULT) {
00534             addcol = shi->rgb;
00535         }
00536         else {
00537             /* input */
00538             switch(ma->rampin_col) {
00539             case MA_RAMP_IN_ENERGY:
00540                 GPU_link(mat, "ramp_rgbtobw", rgb, &fac);
00541                 break;
00542             case MA_RAMP_IN_SHADER:
00543                 fac= is;
00544                 break;
00545             case MA_RAMP_IN_NOR:
00546                 GPU_link(mat, "vec_math_dot", shi->view, shi->vn, &tmp, &fac);
00547                 break;
00548             default:
00549                 GPU_link(mat, "set_value_zero", &fac);
00550                 break;
00551             }
00552 
00553             /* colorband + blend */
00554             do_colorband_blend(mat, ma->ramp_col, fac, ma->rampfac_col, ma->rampblend_col, shi->rgb, &addcol);
00555         }
00556     }
00557     else
00558         addcol = shi->rgb;
00559 
00560     /* output to */
00561     GPU_link(mat, "shade_madd_clamped", *diff, rgb, addcol, diff);
00562 }
00563 
00564 static void ramp_spec_result(GPUShadeInput *shi, GPUNodeLink **spec)
00565 {
00566     Material *ma= shi->mat;
00567     GPUMaterial *mat= shi->gpumat;
00568     GPUNodeLink *fac;
00569 
00570     if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_RAMPS) &&
00571        ma->ramp_spec && ma->rampin_spec==MA_RAMP_IN_RESULT) {
00572         GPU_link(mat, "ramp_rgbtobw", *spec, &fac);
00573         
00574         /* colorband + blend */
00575         do_colorband_blend(mat, ma->ramp_spec, fac, ma->rampfac_spec, ma->rampblend_spec, *spec, spec);
00576     }
00577 }
00578 
00579 static void do_specular_ramp(GPUShadeInput *shi, GPUNodeLink *is, GPUNodeLink *t, GPUNodeLink **spec)
00580 {
00581     Material *ma= shi->mat;
00582     GPUMaterial *mat= shi->gpumat;
00583     GPUNodeLink *fac, *tmp;
00584 
00585     *spec = shi->specrgb;
00586 
00587     /* MA_RAMP_IN_RESULT is exception */
00588     if (ma->ramp_spec && (ma->rampin_spec!=MA_RAMP_IN_RESULT)) {
00589         
00590         /* input */
00591         switch(ma->rampin_spec) {
00592         case MA_RAMP_IN_ENERGY:
00593             fac = t;
00594             break;
00595         case MA_RAMP_IN_SHADER:
00596             fac = is;
00597             break;
00598         case MA_RAMP_IN_NOR:
00599             GPU_link(mat, "vec_math_dot", shi->view, shi->vn, &tmp, &fac);
00600             break;
00601         default:
00602             GPU_link(mat, "set_value_zero", &fac);
00603             break;
00604         }
00605         
00606         /* colorband + blend */
00607         do_colorband_blend(mat, ma->ramp_spec, fac, ma->rampfac_spec, ma->rampblend_spec, *spec, spec);
00608     }
00609 }
00610 
00611 static void add_user_list(ListBase *list, void *data)
00612 {
00613     LinkData *link = MEM_callocN(sizeof(LinkData), "GPULinkData");
00614     link->data = data;
00615     BLI_addtail(list, link);
00616 }
00617 
00618 static void shade_one_light(GPUShadeInput *shi, GPUShadeResult *shr, GPULamp *lamp)
00619 {
00620     Material *ma= shi->mat;
00621     GPUMaterial *mat= shi->gpumat;
00622     GPUNodeLink *lv, *dist, *visifac, *is, *inp, *i, *vn, *view;
00623     GPUNodeLink *outcol, *specfac, *t, *shadfac= NULL;
00624     float one = 1.0f;
00625 
00626     if ((lamp->mode & LA_ONLYSHADOW) && !(ma->mode & MA_SHADOW))
00627         return;
00628     
00629     vn= shi->vn;
00630     view= shi->view;
00631 
00632     visifac= lamp_get_visibility(mat, lamp, &lv, &dist);
00633 
00634     /*if (ma->mode & MA_TANGENT_V)
00635         GPU_link(mat, "shade_tangent_v", lv, GPU_attribute(CD_TANGENT, ""), &vn);*/
00636     
00637     GPU_link(mat, "shade_inp", vn, lv, &inp);
00638 
00639     if (lamp->mode & LA_NO_DIFF) {
00640         GPU_link(mat, "shade_is_no_diffuse", &is);
00641     }
00642     else if (lamp->type == LA_HEMI) {
00643         GPU_link(mat, "shade_is_hemi", inp, &is);
00644     }
00645     else {
00646         if (lamp->type == LA_AREA) {
00647             float area[4][4]= {{0.0f}}, areasize= 0.0f;
00648 
00649             mat->dynproperty |= DYN_LAMP_VEC|DYN_LAMP_CO;
00650             GPU_link(mat, "shade_inp_area", GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_POSITION), GPU_dynamic_uniform(lamp->dynco, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNCO, lamp->ob), GPU_dynamic_uniform(lamp->dynvec, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNVEC, lamp->ob), vn, GPU_uniform((float*)area),
00651                 GPU_uniform(&areasize), GPU_uniform(&lamp->k), &inp);
00652         }
00653 
00654         is= inp; /* Lambert */
00655 
00656         if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_SHADERS)) {
00657             if (ma->diff_shader==MA_DIFF_ORENNAYAR)
00658                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_diffuse_oren_nayer", inp, vn, lv, view, GPU_uniform(&ma->roughness), &is);
00659             else if (ma->diff_shader==MA_DIFF_TOON)
00660                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_diffuse_toon", vn, lv, view, GPU_uniform(&ma->param[0]), GPU_uniform(&ma->param[1]), &is);
00661             else if (ma->diff_shader==MA_DIFF_MINNAERT)
00662                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_diffuse_minnaert", inp, vn, view, GPU_uniform(&ma->darkness), &is);
00663             else if (ma->diff_shader==MA_DIFF_FRESNEL)
00664                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_diffuse_fresnel", vn, lv, view, GPU_uniform(&ma->param[0]), GPU_uniform(&ma->param[1]), &is);
00665         }
00666     }
00667 
00668     if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_SHADERS))
00669         if (ma->shade_flag & MA_CUBIC)
00670             GPU_link(mat, "shade_cubic", is, &is);
00671     
00672     i = is;
00673     GPU_link(mat, "shade_visifac", i, visifac, shi->refl, &i);
00674 
00675 #if 0
00676     if (ma->mode & MA_TANGENT_VN)
00677         GPU_link(mat, "shade_tangent_v_spec", GPU_attribute(CD_TANGENT, ""), &vn);
00678 #endif
00679 
00680     /* this replaces if (i > 0.0) conditional until that is supported */
00681     // done in shade_visifac now, GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_clamp_positive", i, &i);
00682 
00683     if ((ma->mode & MA_SHADOW) && GPU_lamp_has_shadow_buffer(lamp)) {
00684         if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_SHADOWS)) {
00685             mat->dynproperty |= DYN_LAMP_PERSMAT;
00686 
00687             GPU_link(mat, "test_shadowbuf",
00688                 GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_POSITION),
00689                 GPU_dynamic_texture(lamp->tex, GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DSHADOW, lamp->ob),
00690                 GPU_dynamic_uniform((float*)lamp->dynpersmat, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNPERSMAT, lamp->ob),
00691                 GPU_uniform(&lamp->bias), inp, &shadfac);
00692             
00693             if (lamp->mode & LA_ONLYSHADOW) {
00694                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_only_shadow", i, shadfac,
00695                     GPU_dynamic_uniform(&lamp->dynenergy, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNENERGY, lamp->ob), &shadfac);
00696                 
00697                 if (!(lamp->mode & LA_NO_DIFF))
00698                     GPU_link(mat, "shade_only_shadow_diffuse", shadfac, shi->rgb,
00699                         shr->diff, &shr->diff);
00700 
00701                 if (!(lamp->mode & LA_NO_SPEC))
00702                     GPU_link(mat, "shade_only_shadow_specular", shadfac, shi->specrgb,
00703                         shr->spec, &shr->spec);
00704                 
00705                 add_user_list(&mat->lamps, lamp);
00706                 add_user_list(&lamp->materials, shi->gpumat->ma);
00707                 return;
00708             }
00709             
00710             GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", i, shadfac, &i);
00711         }
00712     }
00713     else if ((mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_SHADOWS) && (lamp->mode & LA_ONLYSHADOW)) {
00714         add_user_list(&mat->lamps, lamp);
00715         add_user_list(&lamp->materials, shi->gpumat->ma);
00716         return;
00717     }
00718     else
00719         GPU_link(mat, "set_value", GPU_uniform(&one), &shadfac);
00720 
00721     if (GPU_link_changed(shi->refl) || ma->ref != 0.0f) {
00722         if (!(lamp->mode & LA_NO_DIFF)) {
00723             GPUNodeLink *rgb;
00724             GPU_link(mat, "shade_mul_value", i, GPU_dynamic_uniform(lamp->dyncol, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNCOL, lamp->ob), &rgb);
00725             add_to_diffuse(mat, ma, shi, is, rgb, &shr->diff);
00726         }
00727     }
00728 
00729     if (mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_SHADERS);
00730     else if (!(lamp->mode & LA_NO_SPEC) && !(lamp->mode & LA_ONLYSHADOW) &&
00731        (GPU_link_changed(shi->spec) || ma->spec != 0.0f)) {
00732         if (lamp->type == LA_HEMI) {
00733             GPU_link(mat, "shade_hemi_spec", vn, lv, view, GPU_uniform(&ma->spec), shi->har, visifac, &t);
00734             GPU_link(mat, "shade_add_spec", t, GPU_dynamic_uniform(lamp->dyncol, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNCOL, lamp->ob), shi->specrgb, &outcol);
00735             GPU_link(mat, "shade_add_clamped", shr->spec, outcol, &shr->spec);
00736         }
00737         else {
00738             if (ma->spec_shader==MA_SPEC_PHONG)
00739                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_phong_spec", vn, lv, view, shi->har, &specfac);
00740             else if (ma->spec_shader==MA_SPEC_COOKTORR)
00741                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_cooktorr_spec", vn, lv, view, shi->har, &specfac);
00742             else if (ma->spec_shader==MA_SPEC_BLINN)
00743                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_blinn_spec", vn, lv, view, GPU_uniform(&ma->refrac), shi->har, &specfac);
00744             else if (ma->spec_shader==MA_SPEC_WARDISO)
00745                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_wardiso_spec", vn, lv, view, GPU_uniform(&ma->rms), &specfac);
00746             else
00747                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_toon_spec", vn, lv, view, GPU_uniform(&ma->param[2]), GPU_uniform(&ma->param[3]), &specfac);
00748 
00749             if (lamp->type==LA_AREA)
00750                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_spec_area_inp", specfac, inp, &specfac);
00751 
00752             GPU_link(mat, "shade_spec_t", shadfac, shi->spec, visifac, specfac, &t);
00753 
00754             if (ma->mode & MA_RAMP_SPEC) {
00755                 GPUNodeLink *spec;
00756                 do_specular_ramp(shi, specfac, t, &spec);
00757                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_add_spec", t, GPU_dynamic_uniform(lamp->dyncol, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNCOL, lamp->ob), spec, &outcol);
00758                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_add_clamped", shr->spec, outcol, &shr->spec);
00759             }
00760             else {
00761                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_add_spec", t, GPU_dynamic_uniform(lamp->dyncol, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNCOL, lamp->ob), shi->specrgb, &outcol);
00762                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_add_clamped", shr->spec, outcol, &shr->spec);
00763             }
00764         }
00765     }
00766 
00767     add_user_list(&mat->lamps, lamp);
00768     add_user_list(&lamp->materials, shi->gpumat->ma);
00769 }
00770 
00771 static void material_lights(GPUShadeInput *shi, GPUShadeResult *shr)
00772 {
00773     Base *base;
00774     Object *ob;
00775     Scene *sce_iter;
00776     GPULamp *lamp;
00777     
00778     for (SETLOOPER(shi->gpumat->scene, sce_iter, base)) {
00779         ob= base->object;
00780 
00781         if (ob->type==OB_LAMP) {
00782             lamp = GPU_lamp_from_blender(shi->gpumat->scene, ob, NULL);
00783             if (lamp)
00784                 shade_one_light(shi, shr, lamp);
00785         }
00786 
00787         if (ob->transflag & OB_DUPLI) {
00788             DupliObject *dob;
00789             ListBase *lb = object_duplilist(shi->gpumat->scene, ob);
00790             
00791             for (dob=lb->first; dob; dob=dob->next) {
00792                 Object *ob_iter = dob->ob;
00793 
00794                 if (ob_iter->type==OB_LAMP) {
00795                     copy_m4_m4(ob_iter->obmat, dob->mat);
00796 
00797                     lamp = GPU_lamp_from_blender(shi->gpumat->scene, ob_iter, ob);
00798                     if (lamp)
00799                         shade_one_light(shi, shr, lamp);
00800                 }
00801             }
00802             
00803             free_object_duplilist(lb);
00804         }
00805     }
00806 }
00807 
00808 static void texture_rgb_blend(GPUMaterial *mat, GPUNodeLink *tex, GPUNodeLink *out, GPUNodeLink *fact, GPUNodeLink *facg, int blendtype, GPUNodeLink **in)
00809 {
00810     switch(blendtype) {
00811     case MTEX_BLEND:
00812         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_blend", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00813         break;
00814     case MTEX_MUL:
00815         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_mul", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00816         break;
00817     case MTEX_SCREEN:
00818         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_screen", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00819         break;
00820     case MTEX_OVERLAY:
00821         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_overlay", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00822         break;
00823     case MTEX_SUB:
00824         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_sub", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00825         break;
00826     case MTEX_ADD:
00827         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_add", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00828         break;
00829     case MTEX_DIV:
00830         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_div", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00831         break;
00832     case MTEX_DIFF:
00833         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_diff", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00834         break;
00835     case MTEX_DARK:
00836         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_dark", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00837         break;
00838     case MTEX_LIGHT:
00839         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_light", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00840         break;
00841     case MTEX_BLEND_HUE:
00842         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_hue", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00843         break;
00844     case MTEX_BLEND_SAT:
00845         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_sat", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00846         break;
00847     case MTEX_BLEND_VAL:
00848         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_val", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00849         break;
00850     case MTEX_BLEND_COLOR:
00851         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_color", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00852         break;
00853     default:
00854         GPU_link(mat, "set_rgb_zero", &in);
00855         break;
00856     }
00857 }
00858 
00859 static void texture_value_blend(GPUMaterial *mat, GPUNodeLink *tex, GPUNodeLink *out, GPUNodeLink *fact, GPUNodeLink *facg, int blendtype, GPUNodeLink **in)
00860 {
00861     switch(blendtype) {
00862     case MTEX_BLEND:
00863         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_blend", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00864         break;
00865     case MTEX_MUL:
00866         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_mul", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00867         break;
00868     case MTEX_SCREEN:
00869         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_screen", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00870         break;
00871     case MTEX_SUB:
00872         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_sub", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00873         break;
00874     case MTEX_ADD:
00875         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_add", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00876         break;
00877     case MTEX_DIV:
00878         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_div", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00879         break;
00880     case MTEX_DIFF:
00881         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_diff", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00882         break;
00883     case MTEX_DARK:
00884         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_dark", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00885         break;
00886     case MTEX_LIGHT:
00887         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_light", out, tex, fact, facg, in);
00888         break;
00889     default:
00890         GPU_link(mat, "set_value_zero", &in);
00891         break;
00892     }
00893 }
00894 
00895 static void do_material_tex(GPUShadeInput *shi)
00896 {
00897     Material *ma= shi->mat;
00898     GPUMaterial *mat= shi->gpumat;
00899     MTex *mtex;
00900     Tex *tex;
00901     GPUNodeLink *texco, *tin, *trgb, *tnor, *tcol, *stencil, *tnorfac;
00902     GPUNodeLink *texco_norm, *texco_orco, *texco_object;
00903     GPUNodeLink *texco_global, *texco_uv = NULL;
00904     GPUNodeLink *newnor, *orn;
00905     /*char *lastuvname = NULL;*/ /*UNUSED*/
00906     float one = 1.0f, norfac, ofs[3];
00907     int tex_nr, rgbnor, talpha;
00908     int init_done = 0, iBumpSpacePrev = 0; /* Not necessary, quiting gcc warning. */
00909     GPUNodeLink *vNorg, *vNacc, *fPrevMagnitude;
00910     int iFirstTimeNMap=1;
00911     int found_deriv_map = 0;
00912 
00913     GPU_link(mat, "set_value", GPU_uniform(&one), &stencil);
00914 
00915     GPU_link(mat, "texco_norm", GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_NORMAL), &texco_norm);
00916     GPU_link(mat, "texco_orco", GPU_attribute(CD_ORCO, ""), &texco_orco);
00917     GPU_link(mat, "texco_object", GPU_builtin(GPU_INVERSE_VIEW_MATRIX),
00918         GPU_builtin(GPU_INVERSE_OBJECT_MATRIX),
00919         GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_POSITION), &texco_object);
00920     //GPU_link(mat, "texco_tangent", GPU_attribute(CD_TANGENT, ""), &texco_tangent);
00921     GPU_link(mat, "texco_global", GPU_builtin(GPU_INVERSE_VIEW_MATRIX),
00922         GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_POSITION), &texco_global);
00923 
00924     orn= texco_norm;
00925 
00926     /* go over texture slots */
00927     for (tex_nr=0; tex_nr<MAX_MTEX; tex_nr++) {
00928         /* separate tex switching */
00929         if (ma->septex & (1<<tex_nr)) continue;
00930         
00931         if (ma->mtex[tex_nr]) {
00932             mtex= ma->mtex[tex_nr];
00933             
00934             tex= mtex->tex;
00935             if (tex == NULL) continue;
00936 
00937             /* which coords */
00938             if (mtex->texco==TEXCO_ORCO)
00939                 texco= texco_orco;
00940             else if (mtex->texco==TEXCO_OBJECT)
00941                 texco= texco_object;
00942             else if (mtex->texco==TEXCO_NORM)
00943                 texco= orn;
00944             else if (mtex->texco==TEXCO_TANGENT)
00945                 texco= texco_object;
00946             else if (mtex->texco==TEXCO_GLOB)
00947                 texco= texco_global;
00948             else if (mtex->texco==TEXCO_REFL) {
00949                 GPU_link(mat, "texco_refl", shi->vn, shi->view, &shi->ref);
00950                 texco= shi->ref;
00951             }
00952             else if (mtex->texco==TEXCO_UV) {
00953                 if (1) { 
00954                     GPU_link(mat, "texco_uv", GPU_attribute(CD_MTFACE, mtex->uvname), &texco_uv);
00955                     /*lastuvname = mtex->uvname;*/ /*UNUSED*/
00956                 }
00957                 texco= texco_uv;
00958             }
00959             else
00960                 continue;
00961 
00962             /* in case of uv, this would just undo a multiplication in texco_uv */
00963             if (mtex->texco != TEXCO_UV)
00964                 GPU_link(mat, "mtex_2d_mapping", texco, &texco);
00965 
00966             if (mtex->size[0] != 1.0f || mtex->size[1] != 1.0f || mtex->size[2] != 1.0f)
00967                 GPU_link(mat, "mtex_mapping_size", texco, GPU_uniform(mtex->size), &texco);
00968 
00969             ofs[0] = mtex->ofs[0] + 0.5f - 0.5f*mtex->size[0];
00970             ofs[1] = mtex->ofs[1] + 0.5f - 0.5f*mtex->size[1];
00971             ofs[2] = 0.0f;
00972             if (ofs[0] != 0.0f || ofs[1] != 0.0f || ofs[2] != 0.0f)
00973                 GPU_link(mat, "mtex_mapping_ofs", texco, GPU_uniform(ofs), &texco);
00974 
00975             talpha = 0;
00976 
00977             if (tex && tex->type == TEX_IMAGE && tex->ima) {
00978                 GPU_link(mat, "mtex_image", texco, GPU_image(tex->ima, &tex->iuser), &tin, &trgb);
00979                 rgbnor= TEX_RGB;
00980 
00981                 if (tex->imaflag & TEX_USEALPHA)
00982                     talpha= 1;
00983             }
00984             else continue;
00985 
00986             /* texture output */
00987             if ((rgbnor & TEX_RGB) && (mtex->texflag & MTEX_RGBTOINT)) {
00988                 GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgbtoint", trgb, &tin);
00989                 rgbnor -= TEX_RGB;
00990             }
00991 
00992             if (mtex->texflag & MTEX_NEGATIVE) {
00993                 if (rgbnor & TEX_RGB)
00994                     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_invert", trgb, &trgb);
00995                 else
00996                     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_invert", tin, &tin);
00997             }
00998 
00999             if (mtex->texflag & MTEX_STENCIL) {
01000                 if (rgbnor & TEX_RGB)
01001                     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgb_stencil", stencil, trgb, &stencil, &trgb);
01002                 else
01003                     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_stencil", stencil, tin, &stencil, &tin);
01004             }
01005 
01006             /* mapping */
01007             if (mtex->mapto & (MAP_COL+MAP_COLSPEC)) {
01008                 /* stencil maps on the texture control slider, not texture intensity value */
01009                 if ((rgbnor & TEX_RGB)==0) {
01010                     GPU_link(mat, "set_rgb", GPU_uniform(&mtex->r), &tcol);
01011                 }
01012                 else {
01013                     GPU_link(mat, "set_rgba", trgb, &tcol);
01014 
01015                     if (mtex->mapto & MAP_ALPHA)
01016                         GPU_link(mat, "set_value", stencil, &tin);
01017                     else if (talpha)
01018                         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_alpha_from_col", trgb, &tin);
01019                     else
01020                         GPU_link(mat, "set_value_one", &tin);
01021                 }
01022 
01023                 if (tex->type==TEX_IMAGE)
01024                     if (gpu_do_color_management(mat))
01025                         GPU_link(mat, "srgb_to_linearrgb", tcol, &tcol);
01026                 
01027                 if (mtex->mapto & MAP_COL) {
01028                     GPUNodeLink *colfac;
01029 
01030                     if (mtex->colfac == 1.0f) colfac = stencil;
01031                     else GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", GPU_uniform(&mtex->colfac), stencil, &colfac);
01032 
01033                     texture_rgb_blend(mat, tcol, shi->rgb, tin, colfac, mtex->blendtype, &shi->rgb);
01034                 }
01035                 
01036                 if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_EXTRA_TEX) && (mtex->mapto & MAP_COLSPEC)) {
01037                     GPUNodeLink *colspecfac;
01038 
01039                     if (mtex->colspecfac == 1.0f) colspecfac = stencil;
01040                     else GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", GPU_uniform(&mtex->colspecfac), stencil, &colspecfac);
01041 
01042                     texture_rgb_blend(mat, tcol, shi->specrgb, tin, colspecfac, mtex->blendtype, &shi->specrgb);
01043                 }
01044             }
01045 
01046             if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_EXTRA_TEX) && (mtex->mapto & MAP_NORM)) {
01047                 if (tex->type==TEX_IMAGE) {
01048                     found_deriv_map = tex->imaflag & TEX_DERIVATIVEMAP;
01049 
01050                     if (tex->imaflag & TEX_NORMALMAP) {
01051                         /* normalmap image */
01052                         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_normal", texco, GPU_image(tex->ima, &tex->iuser), &tnor );
01053                         
01054                         if (mtex->norfac < 0.0f)
01055                             GPU_link(mat, "mtex_negate_texnormal", tnor, &tnor);
01056 
01057                         if (mtex->normapspace == MTEX_NSPACE_TANGENT) {
01058                             if (iFirstTimeNMap != 0) {
01059                                 // use unnormalized normal (this is how we bake it - closer to gamedev)
01060                                 GPUNodeLink *vNegNorm;
01061                                 GPU_link(mat, "vec_math_negate", GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_NORMAL), &vNegNorm);
01062                                 GPU_link(mat, "mtex_nspace_tangent", GPU_attribute(CD_TANGENT, ""), vNegNorm, tnor, &newnor);
01063                                 iFirstTimeNMap = 0;
01064                             }
01065                             else { /* otherwise use accumulated perturbations */
01066                                 GPU_link(mat, "mtex_nspace_tangent", GPU_attribute(CD_TANGENT, ""), shi->vn, tnor, &newnor);
01067                             }
01068                         }
01069                         else {
01070                             newnor = tnor;
01071                         }
01072                         
01073                         norfac = minf(fabsf(mtex->norfac), 1.0f);
01074                         
01075                         if (norfac == 1.0f && !GPU_link_changed(stencil)) {
01076                             shi->vn = newnor;
01077                         }
01078                         else {
01079                             tnorfac = GPU_uniform(&norfac);
01080     
01081                             if (GPU_link_changed(stencil))
01082                                 GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", tnorfac, stencil, &tnorfac);
01083     
01084                             GPU_link(mat, "mtex_blend_normal", tnorfac, shi->vn, newnor, &shi->vn);
01085                         }
01086                         
01087                     }
01088                     else if ( (mtex->texflag & (MTEX_3TAP_BUMP|MTEX_5TAP_BUMP|MTEX_BICUBIC_BUMP)) || found_deriv_map) {
01089                         /* ntap bumpmap image */
01090                         int iBumpSpace;
01091                         float ima_x, ima_y;
01092                         float hScale; 
01093 
01094                         float imag_tspace_dimension_x = 1024.0f;        // only used for texture space variant
01095                         float aspect = 1.0f;
01096                         
01097                         GPUNodeLink *surf_pos = GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_POSITION);
01098                         GPUNodeLink *vR1, *vR2;
01099                         GPUNodeLink *dBs, *dBt, *fDet;
01100 
01101                         hScale = 0.1;       // compatibility adjustment factor for all bumpspace types
01102                         if ( mtex->texflag & MTEX_BUMP_TEXTURESPACE )
01103                             hScale = 13.0f;     // factor for scaling texspace bumps
01104                         else if (found_deriv_map!=0)
01105                             hScale = 1.0f;
01106 
01107                         // resolve texture resolution
01108                         if ( (mtex->texflag & MTEX_BUMP_TEXTURESPACE) || found_deriv_map ) {
01109                             ImBuf *ibuf= BKE_image_get_ibuf(tex->ima, &tex->iuser);
01110                             ima_x= 512.0f; ima_y= 512.f;        // prevent calling textureSize, glsl 1.3 only
01111                             if (ibuf) {
01112                                 ima_x= ibuf->x;
01113                                 ima_y= ibuf->y;
01114                                 aspect = ((float) ima_y) / ima_x;
01115                             }
01116                         }
01117 
01118                         // The negate on norfac is done because the
01119                         // normal in the renderer points inward which corresponds
01120                         // to inverting the bump map. Should this ever change
01121                         // this negate must be removed.
01122                         norfac = -hScale * mtex->norfac;
01123                         if (found_deriv_map) {
01124                             float fVirtDim = sqrtf(fabsf(ima_x*mtex->size[0]*ima_y*mtex->size[1]));
01125                             norfac /= MAX2(fVirtDim, FLT_EPSILON);
01126                         }
01127 
01128                         tnorfac = GPU_uniform(&norfac);
01129 
01130                         if (found_deriv_map)
01131                             GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", tnorfac, GPU_builtin(GPU_AUTO_BUMPSCALE), &tnorfac);
01132                         
01133                         if (GPU_link_changed(stencil))
01134                             GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", tnorfac, stencil, &tnorfac);
01135                         
01136                         if ( !init_done ) {
01137                             // copy shi->vn to vNorg and vNacc, set magnitude to 1
01138                             GPU_link(mat, "mtex_bump_normals_init", shi->vn, &vNorg, &vNacc, &fPrevMagnitude);
01139                             iBumpSpacePrev = 0;
01140                             init_done = 1;
01141                         }
01142                         
01143                         // find current bump space
01144                         if ( mtex->texflag & MTEX_BUMP_OBJECTSPACE )
01145                             iBumpSpace = 1;
01146                         else if ( mtex->texflag & MTEX_BUMP_TEXTURESPACE )
01147                             iBumpSpace = 2;
01148                         else
01149                             iBumpSpace = 4; // ViewSpace
01150                         
01151                         // re-initialize if bump space changed
01152                         if ( iBumpSpacePrev != iBumpSpace ) {
01153                             
01154                             if ( mtex->texflag & MTEX_BUMP_OBJECTSPACE )
01155                                 GPU_link( mat, "mtex_bump_init_objspace",
01156                                           surf_pos, vNorg, 
01157                                           GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_MATRIX), GPU_builtin(GPU_INVERSE_VIEW_MATRIX), GPU_builtin(GPU_OBJECT_MATRIX),  GPU_builtin(GPU_INVERSE_OBJECT_MATRIX), 
01158                                           fPrevMagnitude, vNacc,
01159                                           &fPrevMagnitude, &vNacc, 
01160                                           &vR1, &vR2, &fDet );
01161                                 
01162                             else if ( mtex->texflag & MTEX_BUMP_TEXTURESPACE )
01163                                 GPU_link( mat, "mtex_bump_init_texturespace",
01164                                           surf_pos, vNorg, 
01165                                           fPrevMagnitude, vNacc,
01166                                           &fPrevMagnitude, &vNacc, 
01167                                           &vR1, &vR2, &fDet );
01168                                 
01169                             else
01170                                 GPU_link( mat, "mtex_bump_init_viewspace",
01171                                           surf_pos, vNorg, 
01172                                           fPrevMagnitude, vNacc,
01173                                           &fPrevMagnitude, &vNacc, 
01174                                           &vR1, &vR2, &fDet );
01175                             
01176                             iBumpSpacePrev = iBumpSpace;
01177                         }
01178                         
01179                         
01180                         if (found_deriv_map) {
01181                             GPU_link( mat, "mtex_bump_deriv", 
01182                                       texco, GPU_image(tex->ima, &tex->iuser), GPU_uniform(&ima_x), GPU_uniform(&ima_y), tnorfac,
01183                                       &dBs, &dBt );
01184                         }
01185                         else if ( mtex->texflag & MTEX_3TAP_BUMP )
01186                             GPU_link( mat, "mtex_bump_tap3", 
01187                                       texco, GPU_image(tex->ima, &tex->iuser), tnorfac,
01188                                       &dBs, &dBt );
01189                         else if ( mtex->texflag & MTEX_5TAP_BUMP )
01190                             GPU_link( mat, "mtex_bump_tap5",
01191                                       texco, GPU_image(tex->ima, &tex->iuser), tnorfac,
01192                                       &dBs, &dBt );
01193                         else if ( mtex->texflag & MTEX_BICUBIC_BUMP ) {
01194                             if (GPU_bicubic_bump_support()) {
01195                                 GPU_link( mat, "mtex_bump_bicubic",
01196                                         texco, GPU_image(tex->ima, &tex->iuser), tnorfac,
01197                                         &dBs, &dBt );
01198                             }
01199                             else {
01200                                 GPU_link( mat, "mtex_bump_tap5",
01201                                         texco, GPU_image(tex->ima, &tex->iuser), tnorfac,
01202                                         &dBs, &dBt );
01203                             }
01204                         }
01205                         
01206                         
01207                         if ( mtex->texflag & MTEX_BUMP_TEXTURESPACE ) {
01208                             float imag_tspace_dimension_y = aspect*imag_tspace_dimension_x;
01209                             GPU_link( mat, "mtex_bump_apply_texspace",
01210                                       fDet, dBs, dBt, vR1, vR2, 
01211                                       GPU_image(tex->ima, &tex->iuser), texco,
01212                                       GPU_uniform(&imag_tspace_dimension_x), GPU_uniform(&imag_tspace_dimension_y), vNacc,
01213                                       &vNacc, &shi->vn );
01214                         }
01215                         else
01216                             GPU_link( mat, "mtex_bump_apply",
01217                                       fDet, dBs, dBt, vR1, vR2, vNacc,
01218                                       &vNacc, &shi->vn );
01219                         
01220                     }
01221                 }
01222                 
01223                 GPU_link(mat, "vec_math_negate", shi->vn, &orn);
01224             }
01225 
01226             if ((mtex->mapto & MAP_VARS)) {
01227                 if (rgbnor & TEX_RGB) {
01228                     if (talpha)
01229                         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_alpha_from_col", trgb, &tin);
01230                     else
01231                         GPU_link(mat, "mtex_rgbtoint", trgb, &tin);
01232                 }
01233 
01234                 if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_EXTRA_TEX) && mtex->mapto & MAP_REF) {
01235                     GPUNodeLink *difffac;
01236 
01237                     if (mtex->difffac == 1.0f) difffac = stencil;
01238                     else GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", GPU_uniform(&mtex->difffac), stencil, &difffac);
01239 
01240                     texture_value_blend(mat, GPU_uniform(&mtex->def_var), shi->refl, tin, difffac, mtex->blendtype, &shi->refl);
01241                     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_clamp_positive", shi->refl, &shi->refl);
01242                 }
01243                 if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_EXTRA_TEX) && mtex->mapto & MAP_SPEC) {
01244                     GPUNodeLink *specfac;
01245 
01246                     if (mtex->specfac == 1.0f) specfac = stencil;
01247                     else GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", GPU_uniform(&mtex->specfac), stencil, &specfac);
01248 
01249                     texture_value_blend(mat, GPU_uniform(&mtex->def_var), shi->spec, tin, specfac, mtex->blendtype, &shi->spec);
01250                     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_clamp_positive", shi->spec, &shi->spec);
01251                 }
01252                 if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_EXTRA_TEX) && mtex->mapto & MAP_EMIT) {
01253                     GPUNodeLink *emitfac;
01254 
01255                     if (mtex->emitfac == 1.0f) emitfac = stencil;
01256                     else GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", GPU_uniform(&mtex->emitfac), stencil, &emitfac);
01257 
01258                     texture_value_blend(mat, GPU_uniform(&mtex->def_var), shi->emit, tin, emitfac, mtex->blendtype, &shi->emit);
01259                     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_clamp_positive", shi->emit, &shi->emit);
01260                 }
01261                 if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_EXTRA_TEX) && mtex->mapto & MAP_HAR) {
01262                     GPUNodeLink *hardfac;
01263 
01264                     if (mtex->hardfac == 1.0f) hardfac = stencil;
01265                     else GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", GPU_uniform(&mtex->hardfac), stencil, &hardfac);
01266 
01267                     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_har_divide", shi->har, &shi->har);
01268                     texture_value_blend(mat, GPU_uniform(&mtex->def_var), shi->har, tin, hardfac, mtex->blendtype, &shi->har);
01269                     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_har_multiply_clamp", shi->har, &shi->har);
01270                 }
01271                 if (mtex->mapto & MAP_ALPHA) {
01272                     GPUNodeLink *alphafac;
01273 
01274                     if (mtex->alphafac == 1.0f) alphafac = stencil;
01275                     else GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", GPU_uniform(&mtex->alphafac), stencil, &alphafac);
01276 
01277                     texture_value_blend(mat, GPU_uniform(&mtex->def_var), shi->alpha, tin, alphafac, mtex->blendtype, &shi->alpha);
01278                     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_clamp", shi->alpha, &shi->alpha);
01279                 }
01280                 if (!(mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_EXTRA_TEX) && mtex->mapto & MAP_AMB) {
01281                     GPUNodeLink *ambfac;
01282 
01283                     if (mtex->ambfac == 1.0f) ambfac = stencil;
01284                     else GPU_link(mat, "math_multiply", GPU_uniform(&mtex->ambfac), stencil, &ambfac);
01285 
01286                     texture_value_blend(mat, GPU_uniform(&mtex->def_var), shi->amb, tin, ambfac, mtex->blendtype, &shi->amb);
01287                     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_value_clamp", shi->amb, &shi->amb);
01288                 }
01289             }
01290         }
01291     }
01292 }
01293 
01294 void GPU_shadeinput_set(GPUMaterial *mat, Material *ma, GPUShadeInput *shi)
01295 {
01296     float hard = ma->har;
01297 
01298     memset(shi, 0, sizeof(*shi));
01299 
01300     shi->gpumat = mat;
01301     shi->mat = ma;
01302 
01303     GPU_link(mat, "set_rgb", GPU_uniform(&ma->r), &shi->rgb);
01304     GPU_link(mat, "set_rgb", GPU_uniform(&ma->specr), &shi->specrgb);
01305     GPU_link(mat, "shade_norm", GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_NORMAL), &shi->vn);
01306     GPU_link(mat, "set_value", GPU_uniform(&ma->alpha), &shi->alpha);
01307     GPU_link(mat, "set_value", GPU_uniform(&ma->ref), &shi->refl);
01308     GPU_link(mat, "set_value", GPU_uniform(&ma->spec), &shi->spec);
01309     GPU_link(mat, "set_value", GPU_uniform(&ma->emit), &shi->emit);
01310     GPU_link(mat, "set_value", GPU_uniform(&hard), &shi->har);
01311     GPU_link(mat, "set_value", GPU_uniform(&ma->amb), &shi->amb);
01312     GPU_link(mat, "shade_view", GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_POSITION), &shi->view);
01313     GPU_link(mat, "vcol_attribute", GPU_attribute(CD_MCOL, ""), &shi->vcol);
01314     if (gpu_do_color_management(mat))
01315         GPU_link(mat, "srgb_to_linearrgb", shi->vcol, &shi->vcol);
01316     GPU_link(mat, "texco_refl", shi->vn, shi->view, &shi->ref);
01317 }
01318 
01319 void GPU_shaderesult_set(GPUShadeInput *shi, GPUShadeResult *shr)
01320 {
01321     GPUMaterial *mat= shi->gpumat;
01322     GPUNodeLink *emit, *ulinfac, *ulogfac, *mistfac;
01323     Material *ma= shi->mat;
01324     World *world= mat->scene->world;
01325     float linfac, logfac, misttype;
01326 
01327     memset(shr, 0, sizeof(*shr));
01328 
01329     if (ma->mode & MA_VERTEXCOLP)
01330         shi->rgb = shi->vcol;
01331 
01332     do_material_tex(shi);
01333 
01334     if ((ma->mode & MA_TRANSP) && (ma->mode & MA_ZTRANSP))
01335         GPU_material_enable_alpha(mat);
01336 
01337     if ((mat->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_LIGHTS) || (ma->mode & MA_SHLESS)) {
01338         shr->combined = shi->rgb;
01339         shr->alpha = shi->alpha;
01340         GPU_link(mat, "set_rgb", shi->rgb, &shr->diff);
01341         GPU_link(mat, "set_rgb_zero", &shr->spec);
01342     }
01343     else {
01344         if (GPU_link_changed(shi->emit) || ma->emit != 0.0f) {
01345             if ((ma->mode & (MA_VERTEXCOL|MA_VERTEXCOLP))== MA_VERTEXCOL) {
01346                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_add", shi->emit, shi->vcol, &emit);
01347                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_mul", emit, shi->rgb, &shr->diff);
01348             }
01349             else
01350                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_mul_value", shi->emit, shi->rgb, &shr->diff);
01351         }
01352         else
01353             GPU_link(mat, "set_rgb_zero", &shr->diff);
01354 
01355         GPU_link(mat, "set_rgb_zero", &shr->spec);
01356 
01357         material_lights(shi, shr);
01358 
01359         shr->combined = shr->diff;
01360         shr->alpha = shi->alpha;
01361 
01362         if (world) {
01363             /* exposure correction */
01364             if (world->exp!=0.0f || world->range!=1.0f) {
01365                 linfac= 1.0f + powf((2.0f*world->exp + 0.5f), -10);
01366                 logfac= logf((linfac-1.0f)/linfac)/world->range;
01367 
01368                 GPU_link(mat, "set_value", GPU_uniform(&linfac), &ulinfac);
01369                 GPU_link(mat, "set_value", GPU_uniform(&logfac), &ulogfac);
01370 
01371                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_exposure_correct", shr->combined,
01372                     ulinfac, ulogfac, &shr->combined);
01373                 GPU_link(mat, "shade_exposure_correct", shr->spec,
01374                     ulinfac, ulogfac, &shr->spec);
01375             }
01376 
01377             /* ambient color */
01378             if (world->ambr!=0.0f || world->ambg!=0.0f || world->ambb!=0.0f) {
01379                 if (GPU_link_changed(shi->amb) || ma->amb != 0.0f)
01380                     GPU_link(mat, "shade_maddf", shr->combined, GPU_uniform(&ma->amb),
01381                         GPU_uniform(&world->ambr), &shr->combined);
01382             }
01383         }
01384 
01385         if (ma->mode & MA_RAMP_COL) ramp_diffuse_result(shi, &shr->combined);
01386         if (ma->mode & MA_RAMP_SPEC) ramp_spec_result(shi, &shr->spec);
01387 
01388         if (GPU_link_changed(shi->spec) || ma->spec != 0.0f)
01389             GPU_link(mat, "shade_add", shr->combined, shr->spec, &shr->combined);
01390     }
01391 
01392     GPU_link(mat, "mtex_alpha_to_col", shr->combined, shr->alpha, &shr->combined);
01393 
01394     if (ma->shade_flag & MA_OBCOLOR)
01395         GPU_link(mat, "shade_obcolor", shr->combined, GPU_builtin(GPU_OBCOLOR), &shr->combined);
01396 
01397     if (world && (world->mode & WO_MIST) && !(ma->mode & MA_NOMIST)) {
01398         misttype = world->mistype;
01399 
01400         GPU_link(mat, "shade_mist_factor", GPU_builtin(GPU_VIEW_POSITION),
01401             GPU_uniform(&world->miststa), GPU_uniform(&world->mistdist),
01402             GPU_uniform(&misttype), GPU_uniform(&world->misi), &mistfac);
01403 
01404         GPU_link(mat, "mix_blend", mistfac, shr->combined,
01405             GPU_uniform(&world->horr), &shr->combined);
01406     }
01407 
01408     if (!((ma->mode & MA_TRANSP) && (ma->mode & MA_ZTRANSP))) {
01409         if (world && (GPU_link_changed(shr->alpha) || ma->alpha != 1.0f))
01410             GPU_link(mat, "shade_world_mix", GPU_uniform(&world->horr),
01411                 shr->combined, &shr->combined);
01412 
01413         GPU_link(mat, "shade_alpha_opaque", shr->combined, &shr->combined);
01414     }
01415 
01416     if (ma->shade_flag & MA_OBCOLOR) {
01417         mat->obcolalpha = 1;
01418         GPU_link(mat, "shade_alpha_obcolor", shr->combined, GPU_builtin(GPU_OBCOLOR), &shr->combined);
01419     }
01420 }
01421 
01422 static GPUNodeLink *GPU_blender_material(GPUMaterial *mat, Material *ma)
01423 {
01424     GPUShadeInput shi;
01425     GPUShadeResult shr;
01426 
01427     GPU_shadeinput_set(mat, ma, &shi);
01428     GPU_shaderesult_set(&shi, &shr);
01429 
01430     return shr.combined;
01431 }
01432 
01433 GPUMaterial *GPU_material_from_blender(Scene *scene, Material *ma)
01434 {
01435     GPUMaterial *mat;
01436     GPUNodeLink *outlink;
01437     LinkData *link;
01438 
01439     for (link=ma->gpumaterial.first; link; link=link->next)
01440         if (((GPUMaterial*)link->data)->scene == scene)
01441             return link->data;
01442 
01443     /* allocate material */
01444     mat = GPU_material_construct_begin(ma);
01445     mat->scene = scene;
01446 
01447     if (!(scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_NODES) && ma->nodetree && ma->use_nodes) {
01448         /* create nodes */
01449         ntreeGPUMaterialNodes(ma->nodetree, mat);
01450     }
01451     else {
01452         /* create material */
01453         outlink = GPU_blender_material(mat, ma);
01454         GPU_material_output_link(mat, outlink);
01455     }
01456 
01457     if (!scene_use_new_shading_nodes(scene)) {
01458         if (gpu_do_color_management(mat))
01459             if (mat->outlink)
01460                 GPU_link(mat, "linearrgb_to_srgb", mat->outlink, &mat->outlink);
01461     }
01462 
01463 
01464     GPU_material_construct_end(mat);
01465 
01466     /* note that even if building the shader fails in some way, we still keep
01467      * it to avoid trying to compile again and again, and simple do not use
01468      * the actual shader on drawing */
01469 
01470     link = MEM_callocN(sizeof(LinkData), "GPUMaterialLink");
01471     link->data = mat;
01472     BLI_addtail(&ma->gpumaterial, link);
01473 
01474     return mat;
01475 }
01476 
01477 void GPU_materials_free(void)
01478 {
01479     Object *ob;
01480     Material *ma;
01481     extern Material defmaterial;
01482 
01483     for (ma=G.main->mat.first; ma; ma=ma->id.next)
01484         GPU_material_free(ma);
01485 
01486     GPU_material_free(&defmaterial);
01487 
01488     for (ob=G.main->object.first; ob; ob=ob->id.next)
01489         GPU_lamp_free(ob);
01490 }
01491 
01492 /* Lamps and shadow buffers */
01493 
01494 void GPU_lamp_update(GPULamp *lamp, int lay, int hide, float obmat[][4])
01495 {
01496     float mat[4][4];
01497 
01498     lamp->lay = lay;
01499     lamp->hide = hide;
01500 
01501     copy_m4_m4(mat, obmat);
01502     normalize_m4(mat);
01503 
01504     copy_v3_v3(lamp->vec, mat[2]);
01505     copy_v3_v3(lamp->co, mat[3]);
01506     copy_m4_m4(lamp->obmat, mat);
01507     invert_m4_m4(lamp->imat, mat);
01508 }
01509 
01510 void GPU_lamp_update_colors(GPULamp *lamp, float r, float g, float b, float energy)
01511 {
01512     lamp->energy = energy;
01513     if (lamp->mode & LA_NEG) lamp->energy= -lamp->energy;
01514 
01515     lamp->col[0]= r* lamp->energy;
01516     lamp->col[1]= g* lamp->energy;
01517     lamp->col[2]= b* lamp->energy;
01518 }
01519 
01520 static void gpu_lamp_from_blender(Scene *scene, Object *ob, Object *par, Lamp *la, GPULamp *lamp)
01521 {
01522     float temp, angle, pixsize, wsize;
01523 
01524     lamp->scene = scene;
01525     lamp->ob = ob;
01526     lamp->par = par;
01527     lamp->la = la;
01528 
01529     /* add_render_lamp */
01530     lamp->mode = la->mode;
01531     lamp->type = la->type;
01532 
01533     lamp->energy = la->energy;
01534     if (lamp->mode & LA_NEG) lamp->energy= -lamp->energy;
01535 
01536     lamp->col[0]= la->r*lamp->energy;
01537     lamp->col[1]= la->g*lamp->energy;
01538     lamp->col[2]= la->b*lamp->energy;
01539 
01540     GPU_lamp_update(lamp, ob->lay, (ob->restrictflag & OB_RESTRICT_RENDER), ob->obmat);
01541 
01542     lamp->spotsi= la->spotsize;
01543     if (lamp->mode & LA_HALO)
01544         if (lamp->spotsi > 170.0f)
01545             lamp->spotsi = 170.0f;
01546     lamp->spotsi= cosf((float)M_PI*lamp->spotsi/360.0f);
01547     lamp->spotbl= (1.0f - lamp->spotsi)*la->spotblend;
01548     lamp->k= la->k;
01549 
01550     lamp->dist= la->dist;
01551     lamp->falloff_type= la->falloff_type;
01552     lamp->att1= la->att1;
01553     lamp->att2= la->att2;
01554     lamp->curfalloff= la->curfalloff;
01555 
01556     /* initshadowbuf */
01557     lamp->bias = 0.02f*la->bias;
01558     lamp->size = la->bufsize;
01559     lamp->d= la->clipsta;
01560     lamp->clipend= la->clipend;
01561 
01562     /* arbitrary correction for the fact we do no soft transition */
01563     lamp->bias *= 0.25f;
01564 
01565     /* makeshadowbuf */
01566     angle= saacos(lamp->spotsi);
01567     temp= 0.5f*lamp->size*cosf(angle)/sinf(angle);
01568     pixsize= (lamp->d)/temp;
01569     wsize= pixsize*0.5f*lamp->size;
01570         
01571     perspective_m4( lamp->winmat,-wsize, wsize, -wsize, wsize, lamp->d, lamp->clipend);
01572 }
01573 
01574 static void gpu_lamp_shadow_free(GPULamp *lamp)
01575 {
01576     if (lamp->tex) {
01577         GPU_texture_free(lamp->tex);
01578         lamp->tex= NULL;
01579     }
01580     if (lamp->fb) {
01581         GPU_framebuffer_free(lamp->fb);
01582         lamp->fb= NULL;
01583     }
01584 }
01585 
01586 GPULamp *GPU_lamp_from_blender(Scene *scene, Object *ob, Object *par)
01587 {
01588     Lamp *la;
01589     GPULamp *lamp;
01590     LinkData *link;
01591 
01592     for (link=ob->gpulamp.first; link; link=link->next) {
01593         lamp = (GPULamp*)link->data;
01594 
01595         if (lamp->par == par && lamp->scene == scene)
01596             return link->data;
01597     }
01598 
01599     lamp = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPULamp), "GPULamp");
01600 
01601     link = MEM_callocN(sizeof(LinkData), "GPULampLink");
01602     link->data = lamp;
01603     BLI_addtail(&ob->gpulamp, link);
01604 
01605     la = ob->data;
01606     gpu_lamp_from_blender(scene, ob, par, la, lamp);
01607 
01608     if (la->type==LA_SPOT && (la->mode & LA_SHAD_BUF)) {
01609         /* opengl */
01610         lamp->fb = GPU_framebuffer_create();
01611         if (!lamp->fb) {
01612             gpu_lamp_shadow_free(lamp);
01613             return lamp;
01614         }
01615 
01616         lamp->tex = GPU_texture_create_depth(lamp->size, lamp->size, NULL);
01617         if (!lamp->tex) {
01618             gpu_lamp_shadow_free(lamp);
01619             return lamp;
01620         }
01621 
01622         if (!GPU_framebuffer_texture_attach(lamp->fb, lamp->tex, NULL)) {
01623             gpu_lamp_shadow_free(lamp);
01624             return lamp;
01625         }
01626 
01627         GPU_framebuffer_restore();
01628     }
01629 
01630     return lamp;
01631 }
01632 
01633 void GPU_lamp_free(Object *ob)
01634 {
01635     GPULamp *lamp;
01636     LinkData *link;
01637     LinkData *nlink;
01638     Material *ma;
01639 
01640     for (link=ob->gpulamp.first; link; link=link->next) {
01641         lamp = link->data;
01642 
01643         while (lamp->materials.first) {
01644             nlink = lamp->materials.first;
01645             ma = nlink->data;
01646             BLI_freelinkN(&lamp->materials, nlink);
01647 
01648             if (ma->gpumaterial.first)
01649                 GPU_material_free(ma);
01650         }
01651 
01652         gpu_lamp_shadow_free(lamp);
01653 
01654         MEM_freeN(lamp);
01655     }
01656 
01657     BLI_freelistN(&ob->gpulamp);
01658 }
01659 
01660 int GPU_lamp_has_shadow_buffer(GPULamp *lamp)
01661 {
01662     return (!(lamp->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_SHADOWS) &&
01663             !(lamp->scene->gm.flag & GAME_GLSL_NO_LIGHTS) &&
01664             lamp->tex && lamp->fb);
01665 }
01666 
01667 void GPU_lamp_shadow_buffer_bind(GPULamp *lamp, float viewmat[][4], int *winsize, float winmat[][4])
01668 {
01669     float rangemat[4][4], persmat[4][4];
01670 
01671     /* initshadowbuf */
01672     invert_m4_m4(lamp->viewmat, lamp->obmat);
01673     normalize_v3(lamp->viewmat[0]);
01674     normalize_v3(lamp->viewmat[1]);
01675     normalize_v3(lamp->viewmat[2]);
01676 
01677     /* makeshadowbuf */
01678     mult_m4_m4m4(persmat, lamp->winmat, lamp->viewmat);
01679 
01680     /* opengl depth buffer is range 0.0..1.0 instead of -1.0..1.0 in blender */
01681     unit_m4(rangemat);
01682     rangemat[0][0] = 0.5f;
01683     rangemat[1][1] = 0.5f;
01684     rangemat[2][2] = 0.5f;
01685     rangemat[3][0] = 0.5f;
01686     rangemat[3][1] = 0.5f;
01687     rangemat[3][2] = 0.5f;
01688 
01689     mult_m4_m4m4(lamp->persmat, rangemat, persmat);
01690 
01691     /* opengl */
01692     glDisable(GL_SCISSOR_TEST);
01693     GPU_framebuffer_texture_bind(lamp->fb, lamp->tex,
01694         GPU_texture_opengl_width(lamp->tex), GPU_texture_opengl_height(lamp->tex));
01695 
01696     /* set matrices */
01697     copy_m4_m4(viewmat, lamp->viewmat);
01698     copy_m4_m4(winmat, lamp->winmat);
01699     *winsize = lamp->size;
01700 }
01701 
01702 void GPU_lamp_shadow_buffer_unbind(GPULamp *lamp)
01703 {
01704     GPU_framebuffer_texture_unbind(lamp->fb, lamp->tex);
01705     GPU_framebuffer_restore();
01706     glEnable(GL_SCISSOR_TEST);
01707 }
01708 
01709 int GPU_lamp_shadow_layer(GPULamp *lamp)
01710 {
01711     if (lamp->fb && lamp->tex && (lamp->mode & (LA_LAYER|LA_LAYER_SHADOW)))
01712         return lamp->lay;
01713     else
01714         return -1;
01715 }
01716 
01717 /* export the GLSL shader */
01718 
01719 GPUShaderExport *GPU_shader_export(struct Scene *scene, struct Material *ma)
01720 {
01721     static struct {
01722         GPUBuiltin gputype;
01723         GPUDynamicType dynamictype;
01724         GPUDataType datatype;
01725     } builtins[] = { 
01726         { GPU_VIEW_MATRIX, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_VIEWMAT, GPU_DATA_16F },
01727         { GPU_INVERSE_VIEW_MATRIX, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_VIEWIMAT, GPU_DATA_16F },
01728         { GPU_OBJECT_MATRIX, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_MAT, GPU_DATA_16F },
01729         { GPU_INVERSE_OBJECT_MATRIX, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_IMAT, GPU_DATA_16F },
01730         { GPU_OBCOLOR, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_COLOR, GPU_DATA_4F },
01731         { GPU_AUTO_BUMPSCALE, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_AUTOBUMPSCALE, GPU_DATA_1F },
01732         { 0 }
01733     };
01734 
01735     GPUShaderExport *shader = NULL;
01736     GPUPass *pass;
01737     GPUInput *input;
01738     GPUMaterial *mat;
01739     GPUInputUniform *uniform;
01740     GPUInputAttribute *attribute;
01741     GLint lastbindcode;
01742     int i, liblen, fraglen;
01743 
01744     if (!GPU_glsl_support())
01745         return NULL;
01746 
01747     mat = GPU_material_from_blender(scene, ma);
01748     pass = (mat)? mat->pass: NULL;
01749 
01750     if (pass && pass->fragmentcode && pass->vertexcode) {
01751         shader = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUShaderExport), "GPUShaderExport");
01752 
01753         for (input = pass->inputs.first; input; input = input->next) {
01754             uniform = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUInputUniform), "GPUInputUniform");
01755 
01756             if (input->ima) {
01757                 /* image sampler uniform */
01758                 uniform->type = GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DIMAGE;
01759                 uniform->datatype = GPU_DATA_1I;
01760                 uniform->image = input->ima;
01761                 uniform->texnumber = input->texid;
01762                 BLI_strncpy(uniform->varname, input->shadername, sizeof(uniform->varname));
01763             }
01764             else if (input->tex) {
01765                 /* generated buffer */
01766                 uniform->texnumber = input->texid;
01767                 uniform->datatype = GPU_DATA_1I;
01768                 BLI_strncpy(uniform->varname, input->shadername, sizeof(uniform->varname));
01769 
01770                 switch(input->textype) {
01771                 case GPU_SHADOW2D:
01772                     uniform->type = GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DSHADOW;
01773                     uniform->lamp = input->dynamicdata;
01774                     break;
01775                 case GPU_TEX2D:
01776                     if (GPU_texture_opengl_bindcode(input->tex)) {
01777                         uniform->type = GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DBUFFER;
01778                         glGetIntegerv(GL_TEXTURE_BINDING_2D, &lastbindcode);
01779                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GPU_texture_opengl_bindcode(input->tex));
01780                         uniform->texsize = GPU_texture_opengl_width(input->tex) * GPU_texture_opengl_height(input->tex);
01781                         uniform->texpixels = MEM_mallocN(uniform->texsize*4, "RGBApixels");
01782                         glGetTexImage(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, uniform->texpixels); 
01783                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, lastbindcode);
01784                     }
01785                     break;
01786                 }
01787             }
01788             else {
01789                 uniform->type = input->dynamictype;
01790                 BLI_strncpy(uniform->varname, input->shadername, sizeof(uniform->varname));
01791                 switch(input->type) {
01792                 case 1:
01793                     uniform->datatype = GPU_DATA_1F;
01794                     break;
01795                 case 2:
01796                     uniform->datatype = GPU_DATA_2F;
01797                     break;
01798                 case 3:
01799                     uniform->datatype = GPU_DATA_3F;
01800                     break;
01801                 case 4:
01802                     uniform->datatype = GPU_DATA_4F;
01803                     break;
01804                 case 9:
01805                     uniform->datatype = GPU_DATA_9F;
01806                     break;
01807                 case 16:
01808                     uniform->datatype = GPU_DATA_16F;
01809                     break;
01810                 }
01811 
01812                 if (uniform->type >= GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_FIRST && uniform->type <= GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_LAST)
01813                     uniform->lamp = input->dynamicdata;
01814             }
01815 
01816             if (uniform->type != GPU_DYNAMIC_NONE)
01817                 BLI_addtail(&shader->uniforms, uniform);
01818             else
01819                 MEM_freeN(uniform);
01820         }
01821 
01822         /* process builtin uniform */
01823         for (i=0; builtins[i].gputype; i++) {
01824             if (mat->builtins & builtins[i].gputype) {
01825                 uniform = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUInputUniform), "GPUInputUniform");
01826                 uniform->type = builtins[i].dynamictype;
01827                 uniform->datatype = builtins[i].datatype;
01828                 BLI_strncpy(uniform->varname, GPU_builtin_name(builtins[i].gputype), sizeof(uniform->varname));
01829                 BLI_addtail(&shader->uniforms, uniform);
01830             }
01831         }
01832 
01833         /* now link fragment shader with library shader */
01834         /* TBD: remove the function that are not used in the main function */
01835         liblen = (pass->libcode) ? strlen(pass->libcode) : 0;
01836         fraglen = strlen(pass->fragmentcode);
01837         shader->fragment = (char *)MEM_mallocN(liblen+fraglen+1, "GPUFragShader");
01838         if (pass->libcode)
01839             memcpy(shader->fragment, pass->libcode, liblen);
01840         memcpy(&shader->fragment[liblen], pass->fragmentcode, fraglen);
01841         shader->fragment[liblen+fraglen] = 0;
01842 
01843         // export the attribute
01844         for (i=0; i<mat->attribs.totlayer; i++) {
01845             attribute = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GPUInputAttribute), "GPUInputAttribute");
01846             attribute->type = mat->attribs.layer[i].type;
01847             attribute->number = mat->attribs.layer[i].glindex;
01848             BLI_snprintf(attribute->varname, sizeof(attribute->varname), "att%d", mat->attribs.layer[i].attribid);
01849 
01850             switch(attribute->type) {
01851             case CD_TANGENT:
01852                 attribute->datatype = GPU_DATA_4F;
01853                 break;
01854             case CD_MTFACE:
01855                 attribute->datatype = GPU_DATA_2F;
01856                 attribute->name = mat->attribs.layer[i].name;
01857                 break;
01858             case CD_MCOL:
01859                 attribute->datatype = GPU_DATA_4UB;
01860                 attribute->name = mat->attribs.layer[i].name;
01861                 break;
01862             case CD_ORCO:
01863                 attribute->datatype = GPU_DATA_3F;
01864                 break;
01865             }
01866 
01867             if (attribute->datatype != GPU_DATA_NONE)
01868                 BLI_addtail(&shader->attributes, attribute);
01869             else
01870                 MEM_freeN(attribute);
01871         }
01872 
01873         // export the vertex shader
01874         shader->vertex = BLI_strdup(pass->vertexcode);
01875     }
01876 
01877     return shader;
01878 }
01879 
01880 void GPU_free_shader_export(GPUShaderExport *shader)
01881 {
01882     GPUInputUniform *uniform;
01883 
01884     if (shader == NULL)
01885         return;
01886 
01887     for (uniform = shader->uniforms.first; uniform; uniform=uniform->next)
01888         if (uniform->texpixels)
01889             MEM_freeN(uniform->texpixels);
01890 
01891     BLI_freelistN(&shader->uniforms);
01892     BLI_freelistN(&shader->attributes);
01893 
01894     if (shader->vertex)
01895         MEM_freeN(shader->vertex);
01896     if (shader->fragment)
01897         MEM_freeN(shader->fragment);
01898 
01899     MEM_freeN(shader);
01900 }
